snippet.textDisplay: Taps on the balloon don't seem to be registering if the balloon is accelerating downward over a certain rate? I have to wait til the balloon is either not moving (resting on platform) or only moving very slowly downward for taps to register. Anyone know why this inaccuracy exists?
